product.name: METAL BUTTON CROPPED JACKET
product.productinfor: Jacket with lapel collar and long sleeves. Front patch pockets with flaps. Front metal snap button closure.

product.name: SATIN TOP WITH TIE DETAI
product.productinfor: V-neck crop top with wide short sleeves. Gathered hem with tie detail. Invisible side zip fastening.

product.name: STRAIGHT FIT JEANS
product.productinfor: Straight fit jeans. Five pockets. Faded effect. Front zip fly and button fastening.

product.name: HIBISCUS PRINT T-SHIRT
product.productinfor: Round neck T-shirt with short sleeves. Contrasting front print.

product.name: CHECK POLO SHIRT WITH ZIP
product.productinfor: Polo shirt with front zip fastening and long sleeves with a contrast stripe detail. Welt pockets at the hip. Ribbed trims. Front zip fastening.

product.name: PRINTED TOP WITH TIES
product.productinfor: Top made of viscose. Round neck and long sleeves. Adjustable hem with ties in the same fabric. Buttoned opening at the back.
